channel.title: [508] Project 508 - Released [508]
channel.description:
Released - Link to topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,466224.0.html
Hello, I'm Justin :P, here is Project 508.
Welcome to Project 508. Project 508 is not a server but more a "what 508's need", all this is for is to be able to download a 508, with only pretty much core features. I hope you decide to jump onto 508, it's not as bad a revision as everyone makes it out to be.
If you want the download now, you can just PM me. Although, there are a few bugs right now, and I recommend waiting at least 5-7 days for it to be complete. Enjoy.
[size=24pt]Features:[/size]
Trading 100% - No glitches, all fixed Player vs Player & Player vs NPC 90% - It's basically perfect, animations everything. Npc follow after attack 100% - Stops walking after you're far away enough Split Chat Private Messaging 100% - Enabled on login Very Stable - No D'C's so far. Most npc's drop items - Of course not all. 100% SkillCapes 100% Following when attacking a player. 100% Skill Menus - All working Perfectly. 95% World Map - Fixing a glitch after you close it, everything goes black. 100% Prayer - All work perfect - Uses its own Handler Summoning - Removed due to me fucking it up.
There's more, just forgot to write this stuff down.
[size=24pt]Pictures for eye-candy.[/size] World Map: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/worldmap.png[/img] Wildy Jumping: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/WildyJumping.png[/img] Split Chat PM'ing: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/SplitChat.png[/img] Skill Menu's: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/SkillMenu.png[/img] Skillcapes: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/skillcapeEmote.png[/img] Npc Following after attack: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/npcFollowing.png[/img] Npc item drops: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/NpcDrops.png[/img] Npc Die animation: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/NpcDieanim.png[/img] Range Animation: [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/DarkBowPVP.png[/img]
Thanks, hope you like it.
Want the source? PM me. Again, I do recommend you wait for a week or so for it to be complete.
Thanks,
~ Justin Green

item.title: [508] Project 508 - Released [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:20, topic:349463”][quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=445832.msg3282236#msg3282236 date=1279944793]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=445832.msg3282222#msg3282222 date=1279944491]
Then I’ll go though each feature:

  1. You made the entire trade thing yourself? And what about the DC glitch I’ve been to lazy to fix?
  2. Already in the source
  3. I MADE THIS ALREADY NOOB AMG
  4. Someone else discovered it, you just moved the method
  5. Even the worst bulby base never disconnects with 1 person online…
  6. Already in the base
  7. Already in the base
  8. Already in the base
  9. Already in the base
  10. Sigh…
  11. You can open an iterface! GRATS! Btw - to fix the black screen just p.frames.removeShownInterface§?
  12. Already in the base
  13. Could be good.

NOTHING ORIGINAL EXCEPT FULL SUMMONING.
[/quote]The Blank Pali base I used doesn’t have any of the things you mentioned to already be in the base. Stop anal’ing bulby, and switch. If you knew Pali’s base you would know it doesn’t even have Combat :L
[/quote]But C+P’ing it from a different source doesn’t make it special :P[/quote]Nothing here intended to be special. I won’t even call it a source.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Project 508 - Released [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:16, topic:349463”]Nothing special, the map is in the client (you just open an interface?)

And split chat enabled on login is just adding the method to login.java rather than in actionbuttons

GF.

I just thought I’d post it here: I also discovered the REAL item on NPC packet, and got it to give the correct NPC and Item ID’s. Another first for 508s, discovered by me. :D[/quote]If you look at the features, I only added what a starter needs in a server.

Read full topic

item.description:

Nothing special, the map is in the client (you just open an interface?)

And split chat enabled on login is just adding the method to login.java rather than in actionbuttons

GF.

I just thought I’d post it here: I also discovered the REAL item on NPC packet, and got it to give the correct NPC and Item ID’s. Another first for 508s, discovered by me.
